urls.title: Dr. Fauci backed funding for controversial Wuhan lab studying origin...
urls.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, a member of the coronavirus task force, had previously backed funding for a controversial lab in Wuhan, China, that has been studying the coronavirus in bats, reports...

text:
@realDonaldTrump No sir. No vaccines please. 

#BillGates' vaccines paralysed 496,000 children in India.

Investigate Gates' ties to Fauci who funded the Wuhan lab. 

Fauci funded the Wuhan lab.
